00044 #include <cmath>
00045 #include <cfloat>
00046 #include "Ray.h"
00047 
00048 const double Epsilon = DBL_EPSILON;
00049 const double Infinity = HUGE_VAL;
00050 
00051 Ray::Ray( )
00052 : mint( Epsilon ), maxt( Infinity )
00053 {
00054 }
00055 
00056 Ray::Ray( const Point3D& orig, const Vector3D& direc )
00057 : origin( orig ), direction( direc ), mint( Epsilon ), maxt( Infinity )
00058 {
00059 }
00060 
00061 Ray::Ray( const Point3D& orig, const Vector3D& direc, double start, double end )
00062 : origin( orig ), direction( direc ), mint( start ), maxt( end )
00063 {
00064 }
00065 
00066 Ray::~Ray( )
00067 {
00068 }
00069 
00070 Point3D Ray::operator()( double t ) const
00071 {
00072     return origin + direction * t;
00073 }
00074 
00075 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Ray& ray )
00076 {
00077     os << "org: " << ray.origin << "\ndir: " << ray.direction << "\nrange [" <<
00078     ray.mint << "," << ray.maxt << "]";
00079     return os;
00080 }
